Class HtmlContentBuilder<E extends elemental2.dom.HTMLElement>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.elemento.ElementBuilder<E,HtmlContentBuilder<E>>
      • org.jboss.elemento.HtmlContentBuilder<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HtmlContent<E,HtmlContentBuilder<E>>, IsElement<E>, TextContent<E,HtmlContentBuilder<E>>, TypedBuilder<E,HtmlContentBuilder<E>>

    public class HtmlContentBuilder<E extends elemental2.dom.HTMLElement>
extends ElementBuilder<E,HtmlContentBuilder<E>>
implements HtmlContent<E,HtmlContentBuilder<E>>
    Builder for container-like elements with inner HTML.

      HtmlContentBuilder<E> that()
      In order to make builders work with inheritance, sub-builders must return a reference to their instance.
